title: Fragments, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: needlework on knotted net
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of embroidered net in linen and multi-colored silk. Border edged on one side by three pendants. All areas filled by bold floral forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen, silk
